dcterms:creator: A. Krizhevsky
G. Hinton
dcterms:description: CIFAR-10 contains tiny images with a resolution of 32 Ã— 32, consisting of 50K training and 10K testing images, uniformly distributed over 10 classes. It is commonly used for validating the basic properties of learning algorithms.
dcterms:title: CIFAR-10

dcterms:creator: A. Krizhevsky
G. Hinton
dcterms:description: CIFAR-100 is similar to CIFAR-10 but contains 100 classes with 50K training and 10K testing images. It is used for validating the performance of learning algorithms in a more challenging setting.
dcterms:title: CIFAR-100

dcterms:creator: J. Deng
W. Dong
R. Socher
L.J. Li
K. Li
L. Fei-Fei
dcterms:description: ImageNet is one of the largest visual recognition datasets, containing high-resolution images across 1,000 classes, with approximately 1.3 million training images and 50,000 validation images.
dcterms:title: ImageNet
